targets.rawSql: SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000) AS "From"
SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) AS "To"
SELECT (${__to} - ${__from})/1000

SELECT 
  mechanical_issue_time,
  electrical_issue_time, 
  process_issue_time,
  other_issue_time
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT 
  valves_maint_time,
  hyd_oil_unit_maint_time, 
  hyd_oil_plant_maint_time,
  blower_maint_time,
  skip_maint_time,
  limestone_hopper_time,
  other_maint_time
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT created_at,
  other_issue_time,
  mechanical_issue_time, 
  electrical_issue_time, 
  process_issue_time,
  unavailability_time
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT created_at,
  other_maint_time,
  valves_maint_time,
  hyd_oil_unit_maint_time, 
  hyd_oil_plant_maint_time,
  blower_maint_time,
  skip_maint_time,
  limestone_hopper_time,
  waiting_time
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
      ELSE date_trunc('day', created_at)
    END AS time,
    limestone_cycle,
    lime_cycle
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  extract(epoch from (time + ${interval} * INTERVAL '1 second')::timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') * 1000 AS to_time, -- necessary for data link
  SUM(limestone_cycle) AS total_limestone,
  SUM(lime_cycle) AS total_lime
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    SUM(nominal_prod) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    SUM(nominal_prod) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

SELECT
    'previous' AS period,
    SUM(lime_cycle) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'current' AS period,
    SUM(lime_cycle) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

SELECT 
    SUM(nominal_prod) / 1000 / 
    ((${__to} - ${__from})/1000 / 3600.0) AS rate
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP((${__from}/1000)) 
                          AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000)

panels.description: Lime per hour - compared with previous period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    SUM(lime_cycle) / 1000 / 
      ((${__to} - ${__from})/1000 / 3600.0) AS rate
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP((${__from}/1000)) 
                          AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000)

endpoint_id

list.description: Select the correct tag table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard variables.
list.label: Tag Table
list.name: tag_table

list.definition:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'
list.description: Select the correct data table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard data.
list.label: Table
list.name: data_table
list.query:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'
